task.title: TASK 6: Making Mango Greek Frozen Yogurt

context.p:
Tools/Ingredients Needed:
Cool Creations ICE-60W Ice Cream Maker
2 Cups of Whole Milk
2 Cups Vanilla Greek Yogurt
Â½ Cup of Granulated Sugar
4 Cups of Frozen Mango Pieces
1 Teaspoon of Fresh Lime Juice
Medium Sized Mixing Bowl
Food Processor
Strainer

step.cmd: ADD all above ingredients into a food processor
PUREE until the mixture is entirely smooth
STRAIN into a medium sized mixing bowl, refrigerate mixture overnight
FOLLOW steps 5 and 6 in Task 2, pressing the Ice Cream button
